reviews.review_msg: I took Coley's 433W Fall 2024 - it was incredible! So much reading, but it is always clear Coley is 100% dedicated to helping students reach success. Very clear feedback on essays, strives to encourage and elaborate student ideas, gives resources for papers when asked. He's incredible, take a class with him if you can! You won't regret it. 10/10

First time with him and it was a really good experience.There may be some books you need to buy for the class, but some are found online. He's really easy to talk to and obviously cares about his students.

Lots of reading for this class, often reading entire novels to only discuss them for one week. However, Margaret always had interesting supplemental articles to go with the books/poetry that enhanced the learning experience. Very discussion heavy, but she didn't force people to contribute if they weren't comfortable doing so.
